scan_table_check.description: Each Flow and Subflow must be tested and verified through ATF tests. Hence for every Flow and Subfow there must be an ATF test that verifies its functionality. An ATF test must exist in the same application as the Flow or Subflow that contains the name of the Flow or Subflow.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - ATF tests for Flows
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Create an ATF test that checks the behavior of the Flow or Subflow. Make sure that the name of the Flow or Subflow is contained in the name of the ATF test.
scan_table_check.short_description: All Flows and Subflows must be tested by a dedicated ATF test
